caption.p: Stages of the analysis. We tallied GBS cases by analyzing a hospitalization database for 1997–2017 in the state of Rio de Janeiro (see Fig. 2). We also reviewed charts from 2015–17 in the Metro Area II to identify cases of GBS associated with arboviruses. Abbreviations: SIH, Portuguese acronym for hospitalization database; SINAN, Portuguese acronym for notifiable diseases database; G61, ICD‐10 code for inflammatory polyneuropathy; GBS, Guillain‐Barré syndrome.
